user.title: AVR details
user.description: Enter the details for the Pioneer AVR:

data.name: Device name
data.ignore_volume_check: Don't check volume when querying AVR source

data_description.max_source_id: Maximum source ID that AVR source query will check
data_description.ignore_volume_check:
Enable for AVRs that do not report volume when the zone is off, causing it not to be detected automatically.
[ignore_volume_check]

data_description.query_sources: Disable for AVRs that do not support source discovery
data_description.sources: Add source mappings using the format: "00:Source Name"
data_description.command_delay: Delay between commands sent to the AVR
data_description.repeat_count: Repeat action commands on failure up to the specified count

data_description.query_sources: When enabled, sources will be discovered from the AVR and replace manually configured sources
data_description.max_source_id: Maximum source ID that AVR source query will check
data_description.sources: Add source mappings using the format: "00:Source Name"
data_description.command_delay: Delay between commands sent to the AVR
data_description.repeat_count: Repeat action commands on failure up to the specified count

data.power_on_volume_bounce: Workaround for Zone 1 initial volume reporting
data.ignore_volume_check: Don't check volume when querying AVR source
data.volume_step_only: Step volume up/down to set volume level
data.max_volume_zonex: Maximum volume units for other zones

data_description.disable_auto_query:
Disable AVR queries for additional parameters (audio, video, amp, DSP, tuner, channel levels) which may not be supported on some AVR models
[disable_auto_query]
data_description.power_on_volume_bounce:
Enable this workaround on AVRs that do not report the correct volume when the main zone is turned on when an initial volume is configured (eg. VSX-930)
[power_on_volume_bounce]
data_description.ignore_volume_check:
Enable for AVRs that do not report volume when the zone is off, causing it not to be detected automatically
[ignore_volume_check]
data_description.volume_step_only:
Emulate volume level set by stepping volume up/down (eg. VSX-S510)
[volume_step_only]
data_description.params: Additional config parameters to pass to aiopioneer. See https://github.com/crowbarz/aiopioneer?tab=readme-ov-file#params for available options

data_description.debug_config: Additional integration debug configuration. See https://github.com/crowbarz/ha-pioneer_async?tab=readme-ov-file#enabling-debugging for available options
